span.a: Click here for Capac Community Schools Continuity of Learning Plan approved by the St. Clair RESA

span.style: font-size: xx-large; letter-spacing: 0.3px; background-color: white; font-family: "MS Sans Serif";

background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: We are proud of our history and excited about our future. Nestled in a small town environment where family and community are still important, Capac Community Schools have a long history of successful academic and athletic programs. With the support of dedicated staff, students who are committed to their own growth, leave our schools ready for college, career and technical education pathways and beyond. Our alumni have moved onto careers spanning government, business, medical, farming, entrepreneurship and education.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: We invite you and your student to be a part of a great tradition in education and athletics.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "MS Sans Serif"; font-size: 32px; color: rgb(23, 54, 93);

font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(238, 236, 225); font-family: "MS Sans Serif"; color: rgb(23, 54, 93);
